issue.title: Include nested Response in Fixture
issue.body: A Response object can old other Response objects, for example if a 302 Response is followed. We should include all of the Responses in our Fixture and include them when emulating a Response.

issue.title: Add attributes to the Request detailing when a Request is intercepted
issue.body: If a matching Fixture is found it might be useful for debugging purposes to know what Fixture was used to emulate the response.

payload.description: A testing framework to mock Requests sent with amphp/http-client
A testing framework to mock Requests sent with amphp/http-client

issue.title: Running build command should auto-clear cache

milestone.title: v1.3 Release
milestone.description: Quality of life improvements and useful features when using Attributes.

issue.body: The build command will erroneously re-use a cached definition if it is present. This command should clear the cache before building. Rebuilding the cached container is not intuitive and doesn't make sense.

release.name: v1.2.1
release.body:
- Fixes CLI tool referencing an invalid value
- Fixes ContainerDefinition serializer not including ConfigurationDefinitions.

If you had previously cached a serialized ContainerDefinition you should be sure to destroy it and regenerate the cache.

issue.title: ConfigurationDefinition are not properly serialized, resulting in invalid cache

milestone.title: 1.2.1 Release
milestone.description: Contains bug fixes discovered in Annotated Container v1.2.0

issue.body:
When a ContainerDefinition is serialized using the `JsonContainerDefinitionSerializer` any `ConfigurationDefinition` it contains are not included in the serialization. This results in the Configuration having uninitialized properties when creating a Container from this cached definition.

Update the `JsonContainerDefinitionSerializer` to output the correct entries for the `ConfigurationDefinition`.

issue.title: Default BootstrappingDirectoryResolver references incorrect path

milestone.title: 1.2.1 Release
milestone.description: Contains bug fixes discovered in Annotated Container v1.2.0

issue.body: The default directory resolver if none is passed to the Bootstrap goes too far up the parent directories resulting in invalid scan directories.

issue.title: Default BootstrappingDirectoryResolver references incorrect path
issue.body: The default directory resolver if none is passed to the Bootstrap goes too far up the parent directories resulting in invalid scan directories.

issue.title: ConfigurationDefinition are not properly serialized, resulting in invalid cache
issue.body:
When a ContainerDefinition is serialized using the `JsonContainerDefinitionSerializer` any `ConfigurationDefinition` it contains are not included in the serialization. This results in the Configuration having uninitialized properties when creating a Container from this cached definition.

Update the `JsonContainerDefinitionSerializer` to output the correct entries for the `ConfigurationDefinition`.

issue.title: Add event system to allow access to ContainerDefinition after it is built

milestone.title: v1.3 Release
milestone.description: Quality of life improvements and useful features when using Attributes.

issue.body: Particularly when using the provided configuration tool and the Bootstrap implementation there's no longer a reasonable way to get access to the built ContainerDefinition. Some obersver/event mechanism should be implemented such that it is straight-forward to access the finally compiled `ContainerDefinition`, i.e. after all source directories have been scanned and any ContainerDefinitionContextConsumer has been created.
